blog.name: thesilvertargaryens
blog.title: Daenerys Targaryen
blog.description:
Supporting my Queen until my last breath.
D&D ruined the best character in the world. #TeamDany

tags: a song of ice and fire
body:
It’s so nice to see my Queen thrive after the Prince didn’t manage to stab her to death.

D&D should have taken notes.

blog.name: demekii

tags: i did all of this in a single layer and it was so liberating
summary: “I know that she spent her childhood in exile, impoverished, living on dreams and schemes, running from one city to the next,...
caption:
“I know that she spent her childhood in exile, impoverished, living on dreams and schemes, running from one city to the next, always fearful, never safe, friendless but for a brother who was by all accounts half-mad…a brother who sold her maidenhood to the Dothraki for the promise of an army. I know that somewhere upon the grass, her dragons hatched, and so did she. I know she is proud. How not? What else was left her but pride? I know she is strong. How not? The Dothraki despise weakness. If Daenerys had been weak, she would have perished with Viserys. I know she is fierce. Astapor, Yunkai and Meereen are proof enough of that. She has survived assassins and conspiracies and fell sorceries, grieved for a brother and a husband and a son, trod the cities of the slavers to dust beneath her dainty sandaled feet”

Tyrion VI - A Dance With Dragons

Very quick sketch of Dany with her dragon crown!

blog.name: thelastdragon6
blog.title: Starkwalker
blog.description:
HERE TO HAVE A GOOD TIME

<a href=“https://thelastdragon6.tumblr.com/post/183831557809/master-list”>Masterlist.</a>

body:
Burning ember ch.5

A/N- I hope you guys liked this chapter :) I have a lot of cool stuff planned for this series that I’m excited to get to write as the series processes!!

Warning- language, incest

Episode- 1x08, 1x09

Pairing- Aegon x Targaryen!reader

Tagged- @starkbelova , @kaleidoscope-holds-the-prophecy, @omgsuperstarg , @netuno-graphics

(Let me know if you want to be tagged)

—

The hot sun is hitting your skin causing you to have some sweat beads on your forehead as you walk down with Daenerys and the same people that were always with her. She had asked Aegon and you to go with her. You didn’t want to at all but Aegon kept insisting to do so. All you wanted to do was leave now but he kept persisting to stay without no explanation.

The walk is anything but pleasant as you see the Dothraki rape and kill. Or steal things from the dead that are laying on the ground. This is why you didn’t know why Daenerys had chosen to walk over here and not just stay with her husband. As you saw her reaction to all that was happening she looked anything but pleased. Sure this was totally different than when you lived in Dorne but you really didn’t care for it. And even if you did care it wasn’t in your position to stop any of them. But as you saw Aegon you knew he wasn’t liking this at all. You knew he missed the peaceful ways things were back in Dorne as did you but being across the narrow sea was a duty something you needed to do.

As soon as Daenerys ordered the women that were locked up to be realsed Aegon was one of the first ones to help them out. He hated seeing them screaming or being hurt for no reason at all. You thought along with Ser Jorah thought it was a bad idea to help them out but Daenerys insisted. You didn’t like that Aegon put himself out like that. This could cause trouble with the Dothraki men but you also wouldn’t be able to stop him even if you tried.

When you arrived where khal Drogo was he was already expecting Daenerys and the rest of you. Daenerys had saved the women and one of the women In particular was already someone’s so when Daenerys had saved her along with the others let’s just say that Mago was anything but pleased. You just watched them discuss with one another not even wanting to try to get in the middle of it. Mago had hated the idea of Daenerys commanding him so he wanted to fight Drogo but he was stupid to do so. You were pulled behind Aegon as he tried to protect you. But their was nothing to be protected from. Mago didn’t last at all he was instantly killed he only managed to cut Drogo. The cut looked bad but it didn’t matter to you or what the ‘witch’ did to help his cut. You knew it wasn’t good idea for her to do so but Daenerys wouldn’t listen to reason.

-

(Aegon)

He sat by the fire lost in his own thoughts. Thinking of the same dreams he’s been having for the past couple days now. He didn’t know why he would dream it or why it seemed so real. He’s tried to just brush it off by saying it was just a dream but he was confused now. Having the same recurring dream was something that didn’t happen to him before at all. But he also couldn’t speak about it or ask questions because he knew their wouldn’t be answers to them especially not with the Dothraki. But now he couldn’t stop thinking about it. Especially after he saw Khal Drogo getting hurt and the way he kept picking at his wound. He couldn’t help but think of what had seen in his dream. The pyre.

“You’re always all alone why?” He heard Doreah ask him as she sat down by him. It was something odd to see. Him alone. His sister was always by his side especially now that Viserys was gone. She was mostly always by his side. Except for now. And it seemed that everytime Doreah wanted to talk he was alone. Then again was it a coincidence? Probably not.

“Not most of the times.” He told her meeting her gaze. She only smiled sweetly over to him.

“Do they call you the last dragon?” She asked him scooting closer to him. He chuckled at her question.

“I wouldn’t know. A lot of the people didn’t know I or my sister were even alive until we made our way across the narrow sea.” He explained to her only making her more curious.

“You also have dragons blood in you?” She asked him.

“I suppose.” He told her only causing her to smile and run her hand down his arm.

“Have you seen one? A dragon I mean?” She asked keeping her gaze on him. He looked over to her away from the fire.

“Only in my dreams.” She giggles at his comment now putting both hands on his shoulders as she rested her Chin on top of them .

“Ive always wanted to see a dragon.” she said to him almost in a childlike way.

“Why? Why a dragon?” He asked her curiously. She took her hands away from her shoulders and looked down at the fire.

“Because they can fly. And where ever they are a few flaps of their wings and they’re somewhere else. And they can kill.” She said to him. Only making him think about the dragon eggs that are in his dreams even more. This conversation just made him think about the dream even more. As much as he tried ignoring it, it seemed like he couldn’t.

“I suppose that’s true.” He said and once again she looked over at him and placed her hands on her shoulder.

“I’ve seen many things throughout my life like a man change his face like one would with a change of clothes and I’ve seen a man from Asshai with a dagger of real dragonglass an—” Aegon inturrupted her after he saw his sister.

“Come on y/n join us. We’re just telling stories.” He told his sister. Once Doreah saw her stand not far away from them she pulled away and sat further away from Aegon. Y/N smiled and nodded her head in disagreement before she left for her tent. It was forced smile and her eyes told a different story. And Aegon knew it. He could practically feel her anger. He saw the way she looked at Doreah. And if looks could kill he knew she would be dead. But it’s something only he could only notice about her. To anyone else it was just a sweet smile and a sweet look. But he knew that the fire in her violet eyes told something different. He excused himself and made his way to her.

-

(Y/N)

You went into your tent and made your way to your stuff that you had brought from home that was put away. You knew it exactly what you were looking for. A small vase that Ellaria had given you before you left Sunspear. It was a small vase but it was a deadly one. After you had seen Doreah flirting with Aegon you knew their was nothing else to do but use the vase on her and maybe even others. After you found the small bottle you heard footsteps approaching so you hid it and stood up and saw Aegon make his way into your tent. He had a greeter you with a small smile but you only met his smile with a burning glare. You took a few steps closer to where you stood. And you saw his eyes shift from you to the open chest.

“Looking for something?” He asked his smile dropping and his eyebrow raising.

“No.” He looked into your eyes as if looking for an answer. He placed his hand on yours that was hidden behind your back and pulled in gently in front of the both of you.

“Open your hand.” He said his eyes still trained on your closed hand. You didn’t listen and instead kept it closed as you looked up at him as if almost Challenging his gaze. He seemed that he didn’t want to wait so moved your fingers that revealed the small vase. He snatched it from your hand and let your arm drop back to your side. He threw it to the ground making it shatter cross the floor. “Were you really going to poison her?” He asked you with a bit of annoyence hinted in his tone.

“Just putting her and some others to sleep.” You said to him with a smirk playing at your lips making your way past him but before you could he grabbed your arm.

“You find this entertaining?” He asked and you rolled your eyes pulled your arm away from his grasp.

“Do you?” You asked tilting your head a little and narrowing your eyes with the same smirk on your lips.

“Don’t. Don’t play this little game with me now. She’s innocent to any of your little jealous tactics you want to use on her.” Your smirk disappeared now and was replaced by a serious look.

“You do see the way she looks at your right? She’s practically undressing you with her eyes she wants to fuck you. Or you oblivious to it all?” You asked as you placed your hand on your waist. He scoffed and looked down to the floor as he placed both hands on his sides and then dropped them to his sides.

“Yes I’m not an idiot but do you see me acting on her advances?” You didn’t answer and instead crossed your arms on your chest as he looked at you meeting your gaze. “No I don’t you know why?…. because I love you and there’s no one else but you okay? I don’t need anyone else but you. Only you.” He placed his hands on your cheeks and pulled you closer to him. “We only have eachother remember.” He rested his forehead on yours but you still weren’t pleased.

“What about the others? We can’t let them be alive not unless you want a fight.” He pulled away from you and now his soft look was replaced by an angered one.

“Why do you want them dead? There’s no need for them to die.” He said his voice rising.

“I’ve said why already….they’re a threat.” You said your expression remaining the same. Annoyed and not pleased by his persistence on keeping them alive.

“No y/n they’re not a threat. You just view them as one but they’re not. You can’t kill them they’ve done nothing to you.” He said his voice only seem to be raising more. You stayed quiet for a moment. Waiting for him to calm down. He ran his fingers through his hair pulling it back.

“If you don’t want me to kill them then we leave. We leave today. We can go build an army of our own. I’m sure some of the lords in Westeros will ally with us and we can just buy armies here.” You told him walking closer to him . You now were the one to place your hands on his cheeks. He looked down at the ground and then back to you. His gaze softening at your touch.

“No.” He whispered.

“Do you not want it? Do you not—-”

“Do you trust me?” He Inturrpted only causing you to furrow your eyebrows in confusion. “Do you trust me?” He asked again and you nodded.

“You know I do. You’re the only person I trust here.” You told him and he now placed his hands on your cheeks too.

“Then trust me when I say that we have to stay here for now theirs something we need to do here with them.” He said only getting you more confused.

“What is it?”

“Something important and if for some reason it doesn’t happen then….you can do whatever you need to. Alright?”

“Alright.”

-

(Aegon)

Seeing the Khal fall from his horse only made Aegon more and more intrigued by his dream. It made his dream seem to become more realistic. He had gone in to be by his aunts side for support. But mainly it was just to see how he was doing and he saw that he was in a horrible shape. He was paler. He was covered in sweat and didn’t even seem to be awake. He felt bad for his aunt Daenerys and felt bad for what she was going through but something inside him also wanted whatever his dream was to come true.

“How is he?” Aegon asked Ser Jorah as he came out of the tent. Jorah looked at him and nodded.

“Not good. He might die later tonight.” Jorah told Aegon as he followed Jorah somewhere.

“Might? Is there still a chance he might live?” Jorah stopped in tracks at Aegons questions.

“Daenerys wants the witch that helped him with his wound to help him now.” He said as he once again started walking to go find her.

“You think that’s a good idea?” Y/n asked as she walked by Ser Jorahs side.

“No But she’s desperate…. you two might want to armor yourselves tonight and get your weapons.”

After ser Jorah found the witch called Maegi she went into the tent with Daenerys. Aegon and y/n did as they were told. They didnt have armor mainly because they were both trained without it but they did have their weapons.

Aegon and the rest waited outside waiting for any news. It seemed that they had found a way to save him but they needed Drogos horse. And when that happened he knew nothing good was to follow.

And as everything happened he only thought that maybe their was going to be a chance for his dream to come true.

.

.

.

.

“Do you?” You asked tilting your head a little and narrowing your eyes with the same smirk on your lips.

“Don’t. Don’t play this little game with me now. She’s innocent to any of your little jealous tactics you want to use on her.” Your smirk disappeared now and was replaced by a serious look.

“You do see the way she looks at your right? She’s practically undressing you with her eyes she wants to fuck you. Or you oblivious to it all?” You asked as you placed your hand on your waist. He scoffed and looked down to the floor as he placed both hands on his sides and then dropped them to his sides.

“Yes I’m not an idiot but do you see me acting on her advances?” You didn’t answer and instead crossed your arms on your chest as he looked at you meeting your gaze. “No I don’t you know why?…. because I love you and there’s no one else but you okay? I don’t need anyone else but you. Only you.” He placed his hands on your cheeks and pulled you closer to him. “We only have eachother remember.” He rested his forehead on yours but you still weren’t pleased.

“What about the others? We can’t let them be alive not unless you want a fight.” He pulled away from you and now his soft look was replaced by an angered one.

“Why do you want them dead? There’s no need for them to die.” He said his voice rising.

“I’ve said why already….they’re a threat.” You said your expression remaining the same. Annoyed and not pleased by his persistence on keeping them alive.

“No y/n they’re not a threat. You just view them as one but they’re not. You can’t kill them they’ve done nothing to you.” He said his voice only seem to be raising more. You stayed quiet for a moment. Waiting for him to calm down. He ran his fingers through his hair pulling it back.

“If you don’t want me to kill them then we leave. We leave today. We can go build an army of our own. I’m sure some of the lords in Westeros will ally with us and we can just buy armies here.” You told him walking closer to him . You now were the one to place your hands on his cheeks. He looked down at the ground and then back to you. His gaze softening at your touch.

“No.” He whispered.

“Do you not want it? Do you not—-”

“Do you trust me?” He Inturrpted only causing you to furrow your eyebrows in confusion. “Do you trust me?” He asked again and you nodded.

“You know I do. You’re the only person I trust here.” You told him and he now placed his hands on your cheeks too.

“Then trust me when I say that we have to stay here for now theirs something we need to do here with them.” He said only getting you more confused.

“What is it?”

“Something important and if for some reason it doesn’t happen then….you can do whatever you need to. Alright?”

“Alright.”

-

(Aegon)

Seeing the Khal fall from his horse only made Aegon more and more intrigued by his dream. It made his dream seem to become more realistic. He had gone in to be by his aunts side for support. But mainly it was just to see how he was doing and he saw that he was in a horrible shape. He was paler. He was covered in sweat and didn’t even seem to be awake. He felt bad for his aunt Daenerys and felt bad for what she was going through but something inside him also wanted whatever his dream was to come true.

“How is he?” Aegon asked Ser Jorah as he came out of the tent. Jorah looked at him and nodded.

“Not good. He might die later tonight.” Jorah told Aegon as he followed Jorah somewhere.

“Might? Is there still a chance he might live?” Jorah stopped in tracks at Aegons questions.

“Daenerys wants the witch that helped him with his wound to help him now.” He said as he once again started walking to go find her.

“You think that’s a good idea?” Y/n asked as she walked by Ser Jorahs side.

“No But she’s desperate…. you two might want to armor yourselves tonight and get your weapons.”

After ser Jorah found the witch called Maegi she went into the tent with Daenerys. Aegon and y/n did as they were told. They didnt have armor mainly because they were both trained without it but they did have their weapons.

Aegon and the rest waited outside waiting for any news. It seemed that they had found a way to save him but they needed Drogos horse. And when that happened he knew nothing good was to follow.

And as everything happened he only thought that maybe their was going to be a chance for his dream to come true.

.

.

.

.

trail.content_raw:
Burning ember ch.5

A/N- I hope you guys liked this chapter :) I have a lot of cool stuff planned for this series that I’m excited to get to write as the series processes!!

Warning- language, incest

Episode- 1x08, 1x09

Pairing- Aegon x Targaryen!reader

Tagged- @starkbelova , @kaleidoscope-holds-the-prophecy, @omgsuperstarg , @netuno-graphics

(Let me know if you want to be tagged)

—

The hot sun is hitting your skin causing you to have some sweat beads on your forehead as you walk down with Daenerys and the same people that were always with her. She had asked Aegon and you to go with her. You didn’t want to at all but Aegon kept insisting to do so. All you wanted to do was leave now but he kept persisting to stay without no explanation.

The walk is anything but pleasant as you see the Dothraki rape and kill. Or steal things from the dead that are laying on the ground. This is why you didn’t know why Daenerys had chosen to walk over here and not just stay with her husband. As you saw her reaction to all that was happening she looked anything but pleased. Sure this was totally different than when you lived in Dorne but you really didn’t care for it. And even if you did care it wasn’t in your position to stop any of them. But as you saw Aegon you knew he wasn’t liking this at all. You knew he missed the peaceful ways things were back in Dorne as did you but being across the narrow sea was a duty something you needed to do.

As soon as Daenerys ordered the women that were locked up to be realsed Aegon was one of the first ones to help them out. He hated seeing them screaming or being hurt for no reason at all. You thought along with Ser Jorah thought it was a bad idea to help them out but Daenerys insisted. You didn’t like that Aegon put himself out like that. This could cause trouble with the Dothraki men but you also wouldn’t be able to stop him even if you tried.

When you arrived where khal Drogo was he was already expecting Daenerys and the rest of you. Daenerys had saved the women and one of the women In particular was already someone’s so when Daenerys had saved her along with the others let’s just say that Mago was anything but pleased. You just watched them discuss with one another not even wanting to try to get in the middle of it. Mago had hated the idea of Daenerys commanding him so he wanted to fight Drogo but he was stupid to do so. You were pulled behind Aegon as he tried to protect you. But their was nothing to be protected from. Mago didn’t last at all he was instantly killed he only managed to cut Drogo. The cut looked bad but it didn’t matter to you or what the ‘witch’ did to help his cut. You knew it wasn’t good idea for her to do so but Daenerys wouldn’t listen to reason.

-

(Aegon)

He sat by the fire lost in his own thoughts. Thinking of the same dreams he’s been having for the past couple days now. He didn’t know why he would dream it or why it seemed so real. He’s tried to just brush it off by saying it was just a dream but he was confused now. Having the same recurring dream was something that didn’t happen to him before at all. But he also couldn’t speak about it or ask questions because he knew their wouldn’t be answers to them especially not with the Dothraki. But now he couldn’t stop thinking about it. Especially after he saw Khal Drogo getting hurt and the way he kept picking at his wound. He couldn’t help but think of what had seen in his dream. The pyre.

“You’re always all alone why?” He heard Doreah ask him as she sat down by him. It was something odd to see. Him alone. His sister was always by his side especially now that Viserys was gone. She was mostly always by his side. Except for now. And it seemed that everytime Doreah wanted to talk he was alone. Then again was it a coincidence? Probably not.

“Not most of the times.” He told her meeting her gaze. She only smiled sweetly over to him.

“Do they call you the last dragon?” She asked him scooting closer to him. He chuckled at her question.

“I wouldn’t know. A lot of the people didn’t know I or my sister were even alive until we made our way across the narrow sea.” He explained to her only making her more curious.

“You also have dragons blood in you?” She asked him.

“I suppose.” He told her only causing her to smile and run her hand down his arm.

“Have you seen one? A dragon I mean?” She asked keeping her gaze on him. He looked over to her away from the fire.

“Only in my dreams.” She giggles at his comment now putting both hands on his shoulders as she rested her Chin on top of them .

“Ive always wanted to see a dragon.” she said to him almost in a childlike way.

“Why? Why a dragon?” He asked her curiously. She took her hands away from her shoulders and looked down at the fire.

“Because they can fly. And where ever they are a few flaps of their wings and they’re somewhere else. And they can kill.” She said to him. Only making him think about the dragon eggs that are in his dreams even more. This conversation just made him think about the dream even more. As much as he tried ignoring it, it seemed like he couldn’t.

“I suppose that’s true.” He said and once again she looked over at him and placed her hands on her shoulder.

“I’ve seen many things throughout my life like a man change his face like one would with a change of clothes and I’ve seen a man from Asshai with a dagger of real dragonglass an—” Aegon inturrupted her after he saw his sister.

“Come on y/n join us. We’re just telling stories.” He told his sister. Once Doreah saw her stand not far away from them she pulled away and sat further away from Aegon. Y/N smiled and nodded her head in disagreement before she left for her tent. It was forced smile and her eyes told a different story. And Aegon knew it. He could practically feel her anger. He saw the way she looked at Doreah. And if looks could kill he knew she would be dead. But it’s something only he could only notice about her. To anyone else it was just a sweet smile and a sweet look. But he knew that the fire in her violet eyes told something different. He excused himself and made his way to her.

-

(Y/N)

You went into your tent and made your way to your stuff that you had brought from home that was put away. You knew it exactly what you were looking for. A small vase that Ellaria had given you before you left Sunspear. It was a small vase but it was a deadly one. After you had seen Doreah flirting with Aegon you knew their was nothing else to do but use the vase on her and maybe even others. After you found the small bottle you heard footsteps approaching so you hid it and stood up and saw Aegon make his way into your tent. He had a greeter you with a small smile but you only met his smile with a burning glare. You took a few steps closer to where you stood. And you saw his eyes shift from you to the open chest.

“Looking for something?” He asked his smile dropping and his eyebrow raising.

“No.” He looked into your eyes as if looking for an answer. He placed his hand on yours that was hidden behind your back and pulled in gently in front of the both of you.

“Open your hand.” He said his eyes still trained on your closed hand. You didn’t listen and instead kept it closed as you looked up at him as if almost Challenging his gaze. He seemed that he didn’t want to wait so moved your fingers that revealed the small vase. He snatched it from your hand and let your arm drop back to your side. He threw it to the ground making it shatter cross the floor. “Were you really going to poison her?” He asked you with a bit of annoyence hinted in his tone.

“Just putting her and some others to sleep.” You said to him with a smirk playing at your lips making your way past him but before you could he grabbed your arm.

“You find this entertaining?” He asked and you rolled your eyes pulled your arm away from his grasp.

“Do you?” You asked tilting your head a little and narrowing your eyes with the same smirk on your lips.

“Don’t. Don’t play this little game with me now. She’s innocent to any of your little jealous tactics you want to use on her.” Your smirk disappeared now and was replaced by a serious look.

“You do see the way she looks at your right? She’s practically undressing you with her eyes she wants to fuck you. Or you oblivious to it all?” You asked as you placed your hand on your waist. He scoffed and looked down to the floor as he placed both hands on his sides and then dropped them to his sides.

“Yes I’m not an idiot but do you see me acting on her advances?” You didn’t answer and instead crossed your arms on your chest as he looked at you meeting your gaze. “No I don’t you know why?…. because I love you and there’s no one else but you okay? I don’t need anyone else but you. Only you.” He placed his hands on your cheeks and pulled you closer to him. “We only have eachother remember.” He rested his forehead on yours but you still weren’t pleased.

“What about the others? We can’t let them be alive not unless you want a fight.” He pulled away from you and now his soft look was replaced by an angered one.

“Why do you want them dead? There’s no need for them to die.” He said his voice rising.

“I’ve said why already….they’re a threat.” You said your expression remaining the same. Annoyed and not pleased by his persistence on keeping them alive.

“No y/n they’re not a threat. You just view them as one but they’re not. You can’t kill them they’ve done nothing to you.” He said his voice only seem to be raising more. You stayed quiet for a moment. Waiting for him to calm down. He ran his fingers through his hair pulling it back.

“If you don’t want me to kill them then we leave. We leave today. We can go build an army of our own. I’m sure some of the lords in Westeros will ally with us and we can just buy armies here.” You told him walking closer to him . You now were the one to place your hands on his cheeks. He looked down at the ground and then back to you. His gaze softening at your touch.

“No.” He whispered.

“Do you not want it? Do you not—-”

“Do you trust me?” He Inturrpted only causing you to furrow your eyebrows in confusion. “Do you trust me?” He asked again and you nodded.

“You know I do. You’re the only person I trust here.” You told him and he now placed his hands on your cheeks too.

“Then trust me when I say that we have to stay here for now theirs something we need to do here with them.” He said only getting you more confused.

“What is it?”

“Something important and if for some reason it doesn’t happen then….you can do whatever you need to. Alright?”

“Alright.”

-

(Aegon)

Seeing the Khal fall from his horse only made Aegon more and more intrigued by his dream. It made his dream seem to become more realistic. He had gone in to be by his aunts side for support. But mainly it was just to see how he was doing and he saw that he was in a horrible shape. He was paler. He was covered in sweat and didn’t even seem to be awake. He felt bad for his aunt Daenerys and felt bad for what she was going through but something inside him also wanted whatever his dream was to come true.

“How is he?” Aegon asked Ser Jorah as he came out of the tent. Jorah looked at him and nodded.

“Not good. He might die later tonight.” Jorah told Aegon as he followed Jorah somewhere.

“Might? Is there still a chance he might live?” Jorah stopped in tracks at Aegons questions.

“Daenerys wants the witch that helped him with his wound to help him now.” He said as he once again started walking to go find her.

“You think that’s a good idea?” Y/n asked as she walked by Ser Jorahs side.

“No But she’s desperate…. you two might want to armor yourselves tonight and get your weapons.”

After ser Jorah found the witch called Maegi she went into the tent with Daenerys. Aegon and y/n did as they were told. They didnt have armor mainly because they were both trained without it but they did have their weapons.

Aegon and the rest waited outside waiting for any news. It seemed that they had found a way to save him but they needed Drogos horse. And when that happened he knew nothing good was to follow.

And as everything happened he only thought that maybe their was going to be a chance for his dream to come true.

.

.

.

.

summary: If you feel the need to disappear as the last season of your show airs and you're still gone a month later, then you know you...
title: If you feel the need to disappear as the last season of your show airs and you're still gone a month later, then you know you REALLY REALLY REALLY fucked up.
body:
This is in no way normal. Have they given any interviews or done any appearances. Is the plan to hide until people forget? It is pretty safe to say we won’t!! Come out and defend your choices or own up to “taking on too much” 

Can’t hide forever!

Can’t hide forever!

blog.name: how-very-17
blog.title: Targaryen
blog.description:
"I will take what is mine with Fire and Blood I will take it" 
"Dracarys" 
"My reign has just begun" 
"let it be fear"

body:
Slavery and Game of Thrones

I would just like to let everyone who watched, or read game of thrones know that without Daenerys there is nothing holding the slavers back or forcing them to reform anymore.

Dany was the only thing holding them back with her dragons and now that you can’t even say dragons plural anymore and Daenerys is dead with her army scattered……

For all of you that wanted her dead you were the ones that wanted those who she freed to fall back in chains.

Then Again I Guess those people along with D&D KINDA FORGOT

blog.name: waking-dreams-of-harmony
blog.title: Headcanon is the new reality...
blog.description:
Hi there! My name is Ellie! Welcome to my tumblr!  Just thought I'd add a few things to know about me and my blog! If my url gives you any clues, at the heart of this tumblr, I'm a proud Harmony shipper through and through. And while I do still reblog HHR and Dan and Emma content (and I always will) you will find that the majority of my focus has shifted to Jonerys (Jon x Daenerys from Game of Thrones). And while you might have to do a little deep blogging to find my reblogs on these, I also ship--both passionately and casually--Cesare x Lucrezia, Mulder x Scully, Lizzington for a while until tptb started to mess with it, Baker x Lawson (Bawson), all the Sense8 ships though Kalagang is my #1, Clint x Natasha (Clintasha), Jane x Thor (Fosterson), Darcy x Loki (Tasertricks), Darcy x Steve (Shieldshock), Kili x Tauriel (Kiliel), Superman x Wonder Woman (Superwonder), and more than I have space for or the memory to list. 
I do my best to tag every post so that if something is your notp, it's nsfw, or it's triggering, you can blacklist it. That said, if you follow me and there is something that you need tagged in order to make it a happy place for you to explore, come into my inbox and let me know :) You will also see a lot of politically charged reblogs in support of women, the queer/gender-queer and trans community, BLM, Muslims, POC, Jewish people, the mentally ill, and austistic people. I'm strongly pro choice, pro inter-sectional feminism, and refuse to call the angry cheeto currently living in the white house president. If anything like that offends you, this might not be the right blog for you.
Last little few things to throw out there: I'm 35, I plan to adopt at least 4 cats (or more) at some point and be that cat lady everyone's always whispering about, and I tend to greet and converse with everyone I meet like an overeager puppy. 
Whew! Sorry for the long intro folks! Please enjoy your time here, and remember, you're always welcome to come in and say hi!

blog.name: daenerysmyhsa
blog.title: Mother Of Dragons
blog.description: Daenerys ✨| Game of Thrones | Jonerys | In this house we stan the Mother of Dragons | Also a fan of Jon and Arya | Often spend my time praising Emilia Clarke

summary:
You know what confuses me the most?
Jon stabbed Daenerys. That was his way of ending it for her.
Jon Snow, who knew the pain of...
body:
You know what confuses me the most?

Jon stabbed Daenerys. That was his way of ending it for her.

Jon Snow, who knew the pain of being betrayed and murdered by those you trusted… and yet he went and did exactly that to the woman he was supposed to love?

Jon Snow, who knew the horror of dying by a stab wound and how much it terrified him, but yet he did exactly that to Daenerys anyway?

The characterisation this season was so wildly out of place that the writers decided that the best way for Daenerys to die was at the hands of Jon who had died a very similar way at the end of season 5, and didn’t even think back to the fact that they made him feel completely disgusted by the betrayal he received when he was murdered. The real Jon Snow would have NEVER done this to Daenerys, he would have never done this to anyone.

The more and more I think back over this season the more and more frustrated I get at the lack of respect for 7 seasons worth of character arcs all over the show being absolutely annihilated.

blog.name: bellobellissimoinfinity
blog.title: Bello Bellissimo Infinity
blog.description: “I am the artist who loves shapes and all kinds of beauty. Beauty is not a relative thing. Beauty is God. God is beauty with feeling. Beauty is in feeling. I love beauty because I feel it and therefore understand it. Thinking people write nonsense about beauty. Beauty cannot be discussed. Beauty cannot be criticized. I am no criticism. Criticism is an attempt to be clever. I flaunt my beauty. I feel love for beauty.”
